item.title: [REP++][PI] 1 error
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:
@Weasey wrote:

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1691: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1702: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1703: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.freezeTimer = 15; ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1704: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.gfx0(369); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1705: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1711: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.getPA().appendPoison(160); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1712: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.gfx0(391); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1714: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.sendMessage("Nex fill's your l ungs with a deathly smoke!"); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1719: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.gfx0(382); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1721: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1722: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow."); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1728: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.gfx0(377); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1729: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.sendMessage("Nex Saps your health and increases his own."); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1733: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.gfx0(1224); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1742: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.gfx0(2260); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1743: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage; ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1744: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1745: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 18 errors Press any key to continue . . .

EDIT: I removed the Wrath part because it was causing problems, so now I have this:

[code]case 1351: //Nex
int n5 = 0;
final Client c;
if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY,
Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2))
n5 = Misc.random(1);
else
n5 = Misc.random(2);
if (n5 == 0) {
if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage
npcs[i].forceChat(“Die now, in a prison of ice!”);
npcs[i].attackType = 2;
if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){
c.freezeTimer = 15;
c.gfx0(369);
c.sendMessage(“You have been frozen.”);
}
}
} else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage
if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) {
npcs[i].forceChat(“Fill My Soul With Smoke!”);
c.getPA().appendPoison(160);
c.gfx0(391);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.sendMessage(“Nex fill’s your lungs with a deathly smoke!”);
}
} else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage
if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) {
npcs[i].forceChat(“Embrace Darkness!”);
c.gfx0(382);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418);
c.sendMessage(“You’re encased in a unholy shadow.”);
}
} else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage
if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500); {
npcs[i].HP += 185;
npcs[i].attackType = 2;
c.gfx0(377);
c.sendMessage(“Nex Saps your health and increases his own.”);
}
} else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil
if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) {
c.gfx0(1224);
npcs[i].forceChat(“There is…NO ESCAPE!”);
npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2;
}

                    } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack
                            npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                            npcs[i].attackType = 0;       
                    } else if (n5 == 7) { //First!
                            if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) {
                                    npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
                                    npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!");
                                    npcs[i].attackType = 1;
                            }

}
[/code]

And get there errors:

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1701: variable c might not have been initi alized if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1710: variable c might not have been initi alized c.getPA().appendPoison(160); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1718: variable c might not have been initi alized c.gfx0(382); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1727: variable c might not have been initi alized c.gfx0(377); ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1732: variable c might not have been initi alized c.gfx0(1224); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1691: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1702: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ ^ src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1703: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler c.freezeTimer = 15; item.title: [REP++][PI] 1 error
item.dc:creator: @Weasey Weasey
item.description:
@Weasey wrote:

this is located in NPCHandler.java. What i’m attempting to do is add a boss that switches attack styles at certain hp levels.

I get these errors:

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1692: variable c might not have been initi alized int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

And here is the code I used for the last part:

[code] case 1351: //Nex
final Client c;
int n5 = 0;
int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3;
if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY,

Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2))
n5 = Misc.random(1);
else
n5 = Misc.random(2);
if (n5 == 0) {
if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage
npcs[i].forceChat(“Die now, in a prison of ice!”);
npcs[i].attackType = 2;
if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){
c.freezeTimer = 15;
c.gfx0(369);
c.sendMessage(“You have been frozen.”);
}
}
} else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage
if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) {
npcs[i].forceChat(“Fill My Soul With Smoke!”);
c.getPA().appendPoison(160);
c.gfx0(391);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.sendMessage(“Nex fill’s your lungs with a deathly smoke!”);
}
} else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage
if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) {
npcs[i].forceChat(“Embrace Darkness!”);
c.gfx0(382);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418);
c.sendMessage(“You’re encased in a unholy shadow.”);
}
} else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage
if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500); {
npcs[i].HP += 185;
npcs[i].attackType = 2;
c.gfx0(377);
c.sendMessage(“Nex Saps your health and increases his own.”);
}
} else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil
if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) {
c.gfx0(1224);
npcs[i].forceChat(“There is…NO ESCAPE!”);
npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2;
}
} else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath
if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) {
npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs[i].forceChat(“Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!”);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
c.gfx0(2260);
c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage;
c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
}
} else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack
npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs[i].attackType = 0;
} else if (n5 == 7) { //First!
if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) {
npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee
npcs[i].forceChat(“AT LAST!!!”);
npcs[i].attackType = 1;
}
}[/code]

Can anyone fix it?

Read full topic
